metadata.title: CVE-2024-35837 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: mvpp2: clear BM pool before initializationRegister value persist after booting the kernel usingkexec which results in kernel panic. Thus clear theBM pool registers before initialisation to fix the issue.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
